title: Star Ferry Sunset
description: Take the iconic Star Ferry across Victoria Harbour and capture the skyline at golden hour.

title: Peak Tram Conqueror
description: Ride the Peak Tram to Victoria Peak and take a photo with the Hong Kong skyline behind you.

title: Temple Street Night Market
description: Visit Temple Street Night Market, try a local street food dish, and photograph your plate.

title: Dragon's Back Trail
description: Complete the Dragon's Back hiking trail (8.5km). Share your hiking stats: time, distance, and elevation.

title: Dim Sum Master
description: Visit Tim Ho Wan and order at least 3 different dim sum dishes. Photograph each one!

title: Big Buddha Pilgrimage
description: Take the Ngong Ping 360 cable car and visit the Tian Tan Buddha. Photo with the statue required.

title: Sham Shui Po Art Walk
description: Find and photograph 3 different street art pieces in the Sham Shui Po district.

title: Symphony of Lights
description: Watch the Symphony of Lights show at 8PM from Tsim Sha Tsui waterfront and capture the light show.
